page.title: 08ELECTRONIC ENTERTAINMENT (1)
page.content: The low cost of electronic apparatus made in the far east has brought it within reach of everyone. {Televisions (even colour)}are in almost every home. {Video Recorders}are used for recording T.V.programmes on owned cassettes and for showing films from {Video Hire Shops.}Note there is no {cinema}in this block but about 14 Video Hire Shops. Video Recorders are also the main target for{thieves. Low cost micro chips are used to make{Video Games Consoles}(computer games on domestic T.V's) and{Micro {Computers}(programable and for both entertainment and education). {Music Centres}give good quality stereo music reproduction while home {electronic organs}have replaced pianos for home music making. { ** SEE SURVEY RESULTS (NEXT PAGE) **
